title: JSON schema for the metadata of a GDI validator

description.description: Short description of what it checks.

mode.description: Validation mode: 'file' (validates individual file content), 'file-structure' (validates directory layout and required files), or 'file-pair' (validates related files together, e.g., BAM and BAI).

pathSpecification.description: List of path patterns used to select files to validate (e.g., 'METADATA/*.xml').
